Main.TextJPN: 「いいですか皆さん。@k@vS19/22/501400002.お料理は真剣にやらないと思わぬ怪我をします。@k@vS19/22/501400003.これも授業ですから、ふざけないでしっかりやって下さいね！」
Main.TextENG: ``Listen up, everybody.@k@vS19/22/501400002. If you don't take cooking seriously somebody's going to get hurt.@k@vS19/22/501400003. This is part of your education as well, so don't fool around and do it seriously!``

Main.TextJPN: クラス全員がはーーーいと陽気に応える。
Main.TextENG: A lazy ``yeaaah`` wafted through the class in response.

Main.TextJPN: 今日は半日かけて家庭科の授業だ。
Main.TextENG: Half of the school day today was going to be home economics class.

Main.TextJPN: みんなでカレーライスを作り、日頃、校舎として間借りさせてもらってる営林署の皆さんに食べてもらおうという企画らしい。
Main.TextENG: The plan was for everybody to make curry rice, and give it to the forest rangers who let this building be rented out as a school.

Main.TextJPN: みんなでひとつのナベでカレーを作るならただのカレーパーティーだが、やはりそこは授業！@k　低学年はともかく、俺たちは一人ずつカレーを作りその出来を採点されるらしい。
Main.TextENG: If everybody were making curry in the same pot, it would have been more of a party-like atmosphere, but this was school, after all!@k Excluding the youngest students, each one of us would be making our own curry, with the results being judged.

Main.TextJPN: 「いいですか。@k@vS19/22/501400005.今でこそカレーライスは手軽で簡単で誰にでも作れるメニューということになっていますが、カレーは本来インドを発祥とする古式ゆかしいちゃんとしたお料理です」
Main.TextENG: ``Alright, everybody.@k@vS19/22/501400005. It may be that nowadays curry is an easy meal anybody can make, but it has its roots in traditional Indian cuisine.``

Main.TextJPN: 「日本式にアレンジされたとは言え、そこには古代インドの英知と文化が込められています。@k@vS19/22/501400007.ゆめゆめ、そのことをおろそかにしないように」
Main.TextENG: ``Even though we've altered it a bit in the Japanese style, it is still instilled with the knowledge and culture of Ancient India.@k@vS19/22/501400007. Absolutely do not neglect that fact.``

Main.TextJPN: 「真剣にやらない人は先生が本気で怒りますからそのつもりで」
Main.TextENG: ``I'll have words with anybody who doesn't take this seriously, so be prepared for that.``

Main.TextJPN: ……何だか無駄に力の入ったカレー談義だったな。…まぁいいか。
Main.TextENG: ...That seemed like a needlessly passionate sermon on curry. ...Well, whatever.

Main.TextJPN: 「知恵先生はカレーに命かけてるって噂でしてよ。@k@vS19/04/500400002.採点はきっと厳しいですわよ」
Main.TextENG: ``It's rumored that Chie-sensei has devoted her life to curry.@k@vS19/04/500400002. She'll probably be a pretty strict judge.``

Main.TextJPN: 「家庭科の点数なんか、赤点でさえなければ適当でいいんだよ。適当で」
Main.TextENG: ``As long as you're not failing, your grade in Home Ec doesn't really matter. Doesn't really matter at all.``

Main.TextJPN: 「適当なんて言わない方がいいよ…。@k@vS19/02/500200002.先生、カレーに関しては鬼だから」
Main.TextENG: ``I wouldn't say that if I were you...@k@vS19/02/500200002. The teacher's a tyrant when it comes to curry.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…何だよ、そのカレーの鬼って。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13320.…初耳だぞ」
Main.TextENG: ``...What the heck does that even mean? A Curry Tyrant?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13320. ...Never heard of that before.``

Main.TextJPN: 「普段は温厚ないい先生なんだけどねぇ。@k@vS19/03/500300002.…どういうわけかカレーにだけはうるさいんだよ！@k@vS19/03/500300003.　そりゃもう熱中的なくらいに！！」
Main.TextENG: ``You see, our normally mild-mannered teacher...@k@vS19/03/500300002. ...for some unfathomable reason is a stickler for curry!@k@vS19/03/500300003. Oh, passionately so!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「うん。@k@vS19/02/500200004.秘伝のカレーを研究するためにって言って、毎年インドに旅行に行ってるって言ってたもんね」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah.@k@vS19/02/500200004. It's said that every year she goes on a journey to India to research mythical curry.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……風の噂ですと…ご飯は３食カレーライスで、たまに他のものを食べる時でも必ずカレー味というこだわりぶりらしいですの」
Main.TextENG: ``...This is just a rumor, but... It seems that she eats curry rice three meals a day, and if she occasionally has something else, it always has to be curry flavored.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…それ、偏執的というより変態的だぞ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13340.何か悪い宗教にでも入ってるんじゃないのか…？」
Main.TextENG: ``That's... not unyielding, that's unnatural.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13340. Is she part of an evil cult or something...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「大体、カレーなんてジャンクフードの筆頭じゃねーかよ。３食カレーなんて栄養的にも偏って、」
Main.TextENG: ``Besides, doesn't curry top the list when it comes to junk food? Curry three times a day is just weird nutritionally speaking and—``

Main.TextJPN: ドガガガッ！！！
Main.TextENG: *THUNK THUNK THUNK*

Main.TextJPN: 俺のつま先びったりのところに包丁、おたま、フライパン返しが突き刺さり、ビ～ンと揺れている…。
Main.TextENG: Embedded into the table right by my fingertips—a chef's knife, ladle, and spatula—hummed gently as they still quivered.

Main.TextJPN: 先生が自分の鍋をかき混ぜながら、こっちを見て微笑んでいた…。
Main.TextENG: The teacher, while still mixing her own pot, was looking this way, smiling.

Main.TextJPN: 「け、圭ちゃん、シ～～～！！@k@vS19/03/500300005.　…それ以上を言ったら埋葬される…！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ke-Kei-chan, shhhhhhh!!@k@vS19/03/500300005. ...If you say any more you'll be sleeping with the fishes...!!``

Main.TextJPN: それ以上を言うと、それ以上にいろいろとマズイみたいだな…。
Main.TextENG: Saying even a little bit more would make my situation a lot more dire.

Main.TextJPN: 「へいへい。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13370.…しっかり真面目にカレーを作ればいいわけだろ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah, yeah.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13370. ...Just be serious and make your curry properly and everything's good, alright?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……でも今日はそう簡単には行かないのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...I don't think it's going to be that easy today.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あのね、…魅ぃちゃんが…」
Main.TextENG: ``Look... Mii-chan is...``

Main.TextJPN: ……ピーンと来るぞ。
Main.TextENG: ...It's written all over her face.

Main.TextJPN: …土俵が同じで優劣が付くなら…これが勝負にならないわけがない！
Main.TextENG: ...If the playing field is even, and we're being judged... There's no way this won't turn into a competition!

Main.TextJPN: 「わかってるねみんな！！」
Main.TextENG: ``It looks like we're all on the same page!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「料理勝負だぁあぁああ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``It's a Cooking Conteeeesst!!``

Main.TextJPN: そんな気はしてたぜ…！！@k　こんなおいしいイベント、魅音が放っとくわけがない！
Main.TextENG: I knew it!!@k There's no way Mion would leave such an enticing event alone!

Main.TextJPN: 「勝敗はどうするでございますの？@k@vS19/04/500400005.　先生の採点で決めますの？」
Main.TextENG: ``How shall we determine the victor?@k@vS19/04/500400005. By how the teacher judges it?``

Main.TextJPN: それだけではありませんよ、と言いながら現れたのは…なんと先生と校長だった。
Main.TextENG: As if saying ``but wait, there's more!``

Main.TextJPN: 「今日は営林署の皆さんへの感謝のイベントですから、先生だけでなく採点はみんなで行ないますよ」
Main.TextENG: ``The purpose of today's event is to show appreciation for the people at the Forestry Service, so they'll be judging the results with me.``

Main.TextJPN: 「うむ。わしと先生と、それから営林署の方５人で採点する！@k@vS19/00/503200002.　各自健闘を祈るぞ！！@k@vS19/00/503200003.　がっはっはっは！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Yup. Your teacher and I, as well as five people from the Forestry Service, will be judging your cooking!@k@vS19/00/503200002. Good luck to everyone!!@k@vS19/00/503200003. Gahahaha!!!``

Main.TextJPN: こ、校長までー？！？！
Main.TextENG: E-Even the principal!?!?

Main.TextJPN: 見ると、クラスメイトまでが興味深く見守っている。
Main.TextENG: Looking around, it seemed like the interests of everybody in the class had been piqued.

Main.TextJPN: 「そういうわけ。@k@vS19/03/500300009.のんびりしたカレーパーティーなんかには終わらせないよ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``So that's what's happening.@k@vS19/03/500300009. This isn't going to just be some casual curry cook-off!``

Main.TextJPN: 「レナ、カレーは得意だよ！@k@vS19/02/500200007.　今日は負けないよ～！」
Main.TextENG: ``Rena is good at making curry!@k@vS19/02/500200007. I'm not going to lose today!``

Main.TextJPN: 「私の学年は班で作りますから、梨花と一緒なのですわよ」
Main.TextENG: ``My grade is cooking in a group, so I'm together with Rika.``

Main.TextJPN: 「き、汚ねぇ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13390.　梨花ちゃんは確かかなりの料理上手じゃ…！」
Main.TextENG: ``Th-That's unfair!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13390. I'm pretty sure that Rika is good at cooking!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……ボクのカレーで、おいしくって体がどうにかなっちゃうのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...My curry is so tasty it'll send shivers down your spine.``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音はどうだ？！
Main.TextENG: What about Mion!?

Main.TextJPN: あまり料理が上手そうには見えない。
Main.TextENG: She doesn't seem like she's too good at cooking.

Main.TextJPN: こういうヤツは不器用と昔から相場が決まってる！@k　……だが魅音は相変わらずの不敵な表情。
Main.TextENG: Her type has always been bad at this kind of thing.@k ...But Mion continued to look unconcerned.

Main.TextJPN: 「くっくっく…。@k@vS19/03/500300011.……圭ちゃんが今思ってることを当ててあげるよ。@k@vS19/03/500300012.……魅音はきっと料理が下手に違いない。…でしょ～？」
Main.TextENG: ``Hehehe...@k@vS19/03/500300011. ...I'll tell you what Kei-chan is thinking right now.@k@vS19/03/500300012. ...'Mion is definitely bad at cooking.' ...Am I right~?``

Main.TextJPN: い、…嫌な言い方だな。
Main.TextENG: I... I don't like the way she said that.

Main.TextJPN: ………まさか…いや、魅音に限ってそんな…。
Main.TextENG: ...It couldn't be... Mion couldn't possibly...

Main.TextJPN: その時、先生のホイッスルの音が聞こえてきた。
Main.TextENG: At that moment, the teacher's whistle sounded.

Main.TextJPN: 「では皆さん、いいですか？@k@vS19/22/501400011.　刃物には充分に気をつけてくださいね。@k@vS19/22/501400012.始め～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Alright everybody, are you ready?@k@vS19/22/501400011. Be very careful with the knives.@k@vS19/22/501400012. Start~!!``

Main.TextJPN: 戦いの火蓋は切って落とされた…！
Main.TextENG: The call to arms had sounded!

Main.TextJPN: ご飯は飯ごうで炊くが、デイキャンプ仕込みの俺にはそんな難しいものじゃない。
Main.TextENG: We had to use an outdoor kit to cook the rice, but it wasn't that difficult for a camping veteran like me.

Main.TextJPN: お米をとぎ飯ごうに入れ、底に手のひらを当て…ちょうど手首が隠れるくらいが水加減だ。
Main.TextENG: Put the rice into the canister, push your palm to the bottom... and fill with water to just above the wrist.

Main.TextJPN: 「本当にそんな水加減でいいんですの？@k@vS19/04/500400008.　もっと入れないといけないそうですのよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Are you alright with only that much water?@k@vS19/04/500400008. If you don't put in more it could be bad.``

Main.TextJPN: ウソをつけ。
Main.TextENG: You filthy liar.

Main.TextJPN: これ以上いれたら生煮えで芯の残ったお粥になっちまうんだよ！
Main.TextENG: If I put in any more, I'll just be left with some half-cooked porridge!

Main.TextJPN: 「沙都子、それがワナのつもりなら残念だったな。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13410.俺は慣れてるぞ、飯ごう炊飯は！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13420.　始めチョロチョロ中パッパ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13430.赤子泣いてもフタ取るな！」
Main.TextENG: ``Satoko, if that's meant to be a trick, it won't work.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13410. I'm used to cooking rice with these utensils!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13420. First it starts to bubble, then the steam starts to puff.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13430. And don't take off the lid no matter what!``

Main.TextJPN: 「へ～、圭一くんすごいね！@k@vS19/02/500200009.　ちょっと意外。@k@vS19/02/500200010.サマーキャンプで習ったのかな！」
Main.TextENG: ``Hmmm... Keiichi-kun, you're amazing!@k@vS19/02/500200009. This is a little unexpected.@k@vS19/02/500200010. Did you learn this at summer camp?``

Main.TextJPN: 「親父がデイキャンプが好きでさ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13450.夏場なんかにはよく家族で出掛けるんだよ」
Main.TextENG: ``My dad really likes to go camping, see.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13450. Whenever summer comes around, our family goes a lot.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ってことは…全員、ご飯の炊き方は問題なし。@k@vS19/03/500300014.つまり…勝負の分かれ目はカレーの方ってことになるね！」
Main.TextENG: ``So this means... everybody is good at cooking the rice.@k@vS19/03/500300014. In other words, the critical part of this challenge will be the curry!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ふん！@k@vS19/04/500400010.　カレーこそ梨花の独壇場ですのよ！@k@vS19/04/500400011.　皆さんなんかコテンパンですわー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Hmph!@k@vS19/04/500400010. Curry is Rika's specialty!@k@vS19/04/500400011. We'll cream you all!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……梨花の、ってトコが泣けるぞ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13470.お前も何か料理を手伝えよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...You lost me at 'Rika's.'@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13470. Why don't you help with the cooking too?``

Main.TextJPN: 「う～ん、ひょっとすると……沙都子ちゃんは何もお手伝いをしないのが、一番のお手伝いなのかもね☆」
Main.TextENG: ``Hmmm, maybe... Satoko-chan is helping the most by doing nothing at all☆.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ひぅッ！！！@k@vS19/04/500400013.　しょ、勝負は勝てば官軍でございますわよー！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Eep!!!@k@vS19/04/500400013. The ends justify the means!!! I just have to win!!!``

Main.TextJPN: レナにしてはさらっとトゲのあることを言う。
Main.TextENG: That was a pretty malicious comment for Rena.

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子が食って掛かると、レナは笑い転げながらごめんねごめんね、と逃げ回っていた。
Main.TextENG: And Satoko took it hook, line, and sinker. Rena could only apologize between fits of laughter while Satoko chased her around.

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃあ…さっそくカレーの方に行こうかね。@k@vS19/03/500300016.ここからが勝負どころだよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Well now... should we move on to the curry?@k@vS19/03/500300016. For now the battle truly begins!``

Main.TextJPN: ニンジン、ジャガイモなどの定番野菜を流しで洗い、包丁を構える。……ごくり。
Main.TextENG: After rinsing off the carrots, potatoes, and other standard vegetables, I grasped the knife. ...*gulp*

Main.TextJPN: 「今日～のカレーはどんな味～♪」
Main.TextENG: ``What~ will today's curry taste like~♪``

Main.TextJPN: レナは鼻歌混じりに、実に手馴れた手つきで包丁を扱っていた。
Main.TextENG: As Rena hummed along, her very well-practiced hands wielded her knife.

Main.TextJPN: リズミカルにまな板を叩くその音は、日本の古き良き時代を想起させる。@k…平たく言えば完璧ってことだ。
Main.TextENG: The rhythmical sound of the knife hitting the cutting board harkened to kind images of days long past.@k ...Simply put, it was perfect.

Main.TextJPN: あまりに危なげなさ過ぎて……とても勝てる気がしない！
Main.TextENG: It was so calm and practiced... I seriously don't stand a chance!

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子＆梨花ちゃんを見る。
Main.TextENG: I looked over at Satoko and Rika-chan.

Main.TextJPN: …沙都子は野菜を洗うのに専念し、皮むきなどは梨花ちゃんが担当しているようだ。
Main.TextENG: ...Satoko was in charge of washing the vegetables, while Rika-chan was in charge of peeling them.

Main.TextJPN: …話には聞いていたが…梨花ちゃんの包丁捌きも侮れない！！
Main.TextENG: ...That's what I heard being discussed... but Rika-chan's knife-skills are something else as well!!

Main.TextJPN: くるくると、楽しそうにジャガイモの皮をむいていく。
Main.TextENG: She was happily rotating the potato and peeling it quite quickly.

Main.TextJPN: しかも…皮が長い。@kかつら剥きと言ったっけ？@k　あんな風に長く長く皮を剥くのは立派な技術だと聞いたことがある…。
Main.TextENG: On top of that... the peels spanned the entire potato.@k What was that called again? Katsuramuki?@k I've heard that peeling a vegetable in one loop around like that is a highly-regarded technique.

Main.TextJPN: その皮を流しから拾い、おめめを包丁で書き込んで…、
Main.TextENG: She picked up the peel from the sink and carved a pair of eyes into it with her knife...

Main.TextJPN: 「……ヘビさんなのですよ。がおーーー」
Main.TextENG: ``...It's a snake. Roaaaar.``

Main.TextJPN: そう言いながら長々と剥いたジャガイモの皮を同じ班の男子の頭上に乗せている。
Main.TextENG: Saying that she placed the longly-peeled potato skin on top of the head of a boy from her group.

Main.TextJPN: …すごく余裕だ。@k…梨花ちゃんにとっては…料理は勝負ですらないのだ。
Main.TextENG: ...She wasn't even breaking a sweat.@k ...When it comes to Rika-chan and cooking... I couldn't even hold a candle to her.

Main.TextJPN: ……しかし…がおーー？@k　ヘビの鳴き声ってがおーだったっけ…。
Main.TextENG: ...But ...Roaaaar?@k Do snakes make that sound?

Main.TextJPN: さて、魅音はどうだ…？
Main.TextENG: Alright then, how's Mion doing?

Main.TextJPN: きっと不器用に決まってる！
Main.TextENG: She's definitely just fumbling along!

Main.TextJPN: あんなにくるくるとジャガイモの皮がむけるはずはない…！@k　絶対にない！！
Main.TextENG: There's no way she can peel a potato so effortlessly like that!@k Absolutely no way!!

Main.TextJPN: 「そんなわけあるかー！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13490.　絶対ウソだ！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13500.　トリックだＳＦＸだ！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13510.　ワイヤーとか使ってるに違いなーい！」
Main.TextENG: ``This can't be!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13490. You've got to be kidding me!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13500. This a trick! She's using special effects!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13510. Where's the wire? She's definitely using a wire!``

Main.TextJPN: 「くっくっくっく…。@k@vS19/03/500300018.ほれ、びろーん」
Main.TextENG: ``Hehehehe...@k@vS19/03/500300018. Here, take a looksie.``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音が勝ち誇ったように、長々と剥けたジャガイモの皮を見せ付けた。
Main.TextENG: As if she had already won, Mion proudly showed me the elongated potato skin.

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭一は知らないですか。@k@vS19/05/500500005.魅ぃはお婆ちゃんにお料理とかも教えてもらってるですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...You didn't know, Keiichi?@k@vS19/05/500500005. Mii was taught how to cook by her grandma.``

Main.TextJPN: 「料理だけじゃないよ～。@k@vS19/02/500200014.裁縫からお華にお琴、銃器から無線機、ヘリの操縦まで何でも出来るんだからねぇ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Not just cooking~.@k@vS19/02/500200014. From sewing to flower arrangement to playing the koto. From marksmanship to radio operation. Even helicopter piloting is but one of the myriad things she can do!``

Main.TextJPN: …後に行くほど現実味が増すな。
Main.TextENG: ...Strangely enough, the latter items were more realistic.

Main.TextJPN: 筆頭の裁縫の方がむしろウソくさいのが不思議だ。
Main.TextENG: It was the first few items on that list that seemed like a lie.

Main.TextJPN: 「本当はすっごくお料理上手なんだよ。@k@vS19/02/500200016.…面倒臭がって全然作らないけどね～」
Main.TextENG: ``She's actually really good at cooking.@k@vS19/02/500200016. ...It's just such a hassle that she never does it though~.``

Main.TextJPN: く、くそ～！！
Main.TextENG: D-Dammit!!

Main.TextJPN: 俺も本当は料理は得意なんだぞ…！@k　特に中華なんかは…！！
Main.TextENG: I'm also really good at cooking!@k Especially Chinese food!!

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭一、お湯を沸かして注ぐのは料理に入りませんです」
Main.TextENG: ``...Keiichi, boiling something and pouring it into a bowl doesn't count as cooking.``

Main.TextJPN: これから口に出そうとしたネタを、口に出す前に釘を刺されてしまう…。
Main.TextENG: Shot down before I could even say it.

Main.TextJPN: 「をっほっほ！！@k@vS19/04/500400015.　ざまーないですわね！！@k@vS19/04/500400016.　今日は圭一さんの一人負け確定ですわよ～！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh ho ho!!@k@vS19/04/500400015. Too bad for you!!@k@vS19/04/500400016. Today Keiichi-san shall be assuredly languishing in defeat all alone!!!``

Main.TextJPN: ごちんッ！！！
Main.TextENG: *clank!!!*

Main.TextJPN: 「てめーだって料理できないだろがー！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Tough words from somebody who can't even cook by herself!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ふわぁああぁああぁああん！！！@k@vS19/04/500400018.　梨花ぁ～！」
Main.TextENG: ``Waaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!@k@vS19/04/500400018. Rikaaaaaa~``

Main.TextJPN: 「かわいそかわいそです。@k@vS19/05/500500008.……ボクが圭一をコテンパンにしてあげますです」
Main.TextENG: ``There there.@k@vS19/05/500500008. ...I'll destroy Keiichi for you.``

Main.TextJPN: ぐ！　……形勢は…不利か…！
Main.TextENG: Gah! ...This does not look good...!

Main.TextJPN: 全員が不敵な笑みを向ける！
Main.TextENG: Everybody is smirking at me!

Main.TextJPN: 早くも白旗かよ前原圭一！！
Main.TextENG: Don't raise the white flag yet, Keiichi Maebara!!

Main.TextJPN: 勝負を投げるな！
Main.TextENG: Don't throw away this match!

Main.TextJPN: クールに考えろ！
Main.TextENG: Calm down and think!

Main.TextJPN: ジャガイモの皮を上手にむく方法じゃない。@k…いかにしてこの勝負を制するかだ！！
Main.TextENG: Not about how to peel these potatoes well.@k ...But about how to win this challenge!!

Main.TextJPN: 「……ここはギャラリーが多い。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13540.俺、他の流しで仕事するから」
Main.TextENG: ``...There's too many people watching.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13540. I'm... going to work at another sink.``

Main.TextJPN: それだけ告げて、俺は野菜一式を抱えその場を後にした…。
Main.TextENG: Saying only that, I gathered up all the vegetables and left that spot behind...

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一くん、大丈夫かな。@k@vS19/02/500200018.包丁で指とか切らないか心配…」
Main.TextENG: ``Will Keiichi-kun be alright?@k@vS19/02/500200018. I'm worried he might cut himself with his knife...``

Main.TextJPN: 「さぁて…圭ちゃんのお手並み、拝見だね～！」
Main.TextENG: ``Let's see what Kei-chan's doing~!``

Main.TextJPN: 俺が皮むきに精を出したって、下手すりゃ指をちょん切るのがオチだ！
Main.TextENG: No matter how hard I try peeling these, if I slip up at this speed I'll lop my fingers right off!

Main.TextJPN: なら…方法はひとつ！！
Main.TextENG: Then... there's only one thing left to do!!

Main.TextJPN: 「富田くん、岡村くん！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13560.　お、君たちは４人でグループか」
Main.TextENG: ``Tomita-kun, Okamura-kun!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13560. Oh, you guys were in a group of four, huh.``

Main.TextJPN: 先日の日曜日、例のおもちゃ屋でのイベント以来、義兄弟の契りを結んだあの後輩二人組だ。
Main.TextENG: It was the two underclassmen that had become my sworn brothers ever since the event at that toy store last Sunday.

Main.TextJPN: どうやら、女子２人と組んで４人の班らしい。
Main.TextENG: They had been paired with two girls for their group.

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、はい。@k@vS19/24/502400002.女子２人が料理とか得意なんで」
Main.TextENG: ``Yep.@k@vS19/24/502400002. Both the girls are pretty good at cooking.``

Main.TextJPN: 「俺らは遊んでるだけでＯＫです」
Main.TextENG: ``So both of us can just mess around and we'll be okay.``

Main.TextJPN: …２人が指差す先にいる女子２人。
Main.TextENG: ...Both of them pointed at the girls.

Main.TextJPN: …なるほど、レナには及ばないが、充分、及第点に値する包丁捌きのようだった。
Main.TextENG: ...They're not as good as Rena, but they were both good enough at handling a knife.

Main.TextJPN: 「単刀直入に言おう。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13580.このままでは部活に負ける！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13590.　君たちの班が剥いた野菜をくれ」
Main.TextENG: ``I'll get straight to the point.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13580. At this rate, I'm going to lose this contest!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13590. Give me the vegetables your group has peeled already.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ま、前原さん、…それ、ほとんど恐喝です。@k@vS19/24/502400004.……でも、まぁ話によっては…」
Main.TextENG: ``Ma-Maebara-san, ...That's pretty much theft.@k@vS19/24/502400004. ...But depending on what's in it for us...``

Main.TextJPN: 「交渉次第ならＯＫってことですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``In other words, it depends on the terms of negotiation.``

Main.TextJPN: 「む、たくましいヤツらだな！　…まぁ当然だ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13610.ではこうしよう」
Main.TextENG: ``Hmph, quite bold of you guys! ...Well, that's to be expected.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13610. Then let's do this.``

Main.TextJPN: 「俺が勝てたら、沙都子＆梨花ちゃんグループのカレーを食わせてやる。これならどうだ？」
Main.TextENG: ``If I win, I'll let you eat the curry that Satoko and Rika-chan's group makes. How about that?``

Main.TextJPN: 「え、…あ、……ど、どうしようかな……」
Main.TextENG: ``Eh, ...Ah. ...I-I don't know about that...``

Main.TextJPN: 二人ともいきなり核心な条件提示に度肝を抜かれてるようだが……まだ一押し足りないらしい。
Main.TextENG: Both of them were hesitant after such a weighty proposal... just one more little push seems in order.

Main.TextJPN: いいだろう、駄目押しだ。
Main.TextENG: Very well then, let's make them an offer they can't refuse.

Main.TextJPN: ………二人の肩をぐっと寄せ小声で告げる。
Main.TextENG: ...I pulled both of them close by the shoulders and made my offer in a hushed tone.

Main.TextJPN: 「…もちろん沙都子と梨花ちゃんの食べかけをだ」
Main.TextENG: ``...Of course, that includes the part that Satoko and Rika-chan have already eaten some of.``

Main.TextJPN: 「スプーンも付ける」
Main.TextENG: ``I'll even throw in the spoons.``

Main.TextJPN: ぶはッ！！@k　二人の後輩の鼻から威勢良く赤い飛沫が飛び出す…。
Main.TextENG: *splooge*@k A red mist spouted vigorously from the noses of the two underclassmen.

Main.TextJPN: 「あら…？@k@vS19/04/500400020.　…圭一さんも…結構やりますのね…！@k@vS19/04/500400021.　きれいなジャガイモですこと」
Main.TextENG: ``Hmm...?@k@vS19/04/500400020. ...Keiichi-san... is also pretty good at this...!@k@vS19/04/500400021. Those are some very nice potatoes.``

Main.TextJPN: 俺は見事、野菜の皮むきをクリアーし、仲間のもとへ意気揚々と戻ってきた。
Main.TextENG: Having brilliantly cleared the vegetable peeling challenge, I returned to my comrades in triumph.

Main.TextJPN: 「へー、すごいねすごいね！@k@vS19/02/500200020.　圭一くんの皮剥き、上手だよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Whoa, amazing, amazing!@k@vS19/02/500200020. Keiichi-kun's peeling is really good!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……ふ。@k@vS19/03/500300021.違うね。@k@vS19/03/500300022.圭ちゃんが剥いたのはジャガイモじゃなく、…牙でしょ？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Hmph.@k@vS19/03/500300021. That's not quite right.@k@vS19/03/500300022. What Kei-chan has bared isn't a potato, but his fangs!``

Main.TextJPN: 「あぁ…。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13660.俺はとっくに本気だぞ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13670.てめーらまとめてぶっ潰してやるぜー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah...@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13660. I'm super serious about this.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13670. I'll crush you all!!``

Main.TextJPN: 野菜の下ごしらえが終わったら、なべを沸かし、火が通りにくい野菜から順に入れていく。@k……このあたりはキャンプの時、お袋に習ったからな。
Main.TextENG: Having finished with preparing the vegetables, next is to boil a pot of water, then add the vegetables in order of which takes longest to cook.@k ...I learned this part from my mother when we went camping.

Main.TextJPN: だが…このまま順当に続けても…大きなポイントの獲得にはならないだろう。
Main.TextENG: But... just cooking in order... it probably won't garner a lot of points.

Main.TextJPN: レナを見ると……何だかいろんな野菜を絶妙なバランスで煮込んでいる。
Main.TextENG: Look over at Rena... she had a variety of vegetables cooking together in a delicate balance.

Main.TextJPN: それは野心的でもなければ打算的なゲーム感覚でもない。@k……おいしいご飯を作る、母の技…。
Main.TextENG: She wasn't being ambitious or calculating a way to win the game.@k ...She was making delicious food with a mother's touch...

Main.TextJPN: 魅音がいかに技を尽くそうと勝負になる気はするが、レナに関しては勝負にすらなるまい…。@k…完璧に格が違うのだ…。
Main.TextENG: I have a feeling that I could somehow compete with Mion in terms of technique, but I would be no match for Rena...@k ...She was way out of my league...

Main.TextJPN: 「うちのお母さんのカレーはね、いっつも具沢山だったんだよ。@k@vS19/02/500200022.だからレナのカレーも具沢山なの。@k@vS19/02/500200023.……本当は一晩かけてじっくり煮たいんだけどね…。はぅ」
Main.TextENG: ``When my mother makes curry, you see, she always uses lots of ingredients.@k@vS19/02/500200022. That's why Rena's curry uses a lot of ingredients as well.@k@vS19/02/500200023. ...I really wanted to take all night and stew it nice and slow... hau.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……頼む。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13690.俺のカレーにも少しお力を貸してくれないか…」
Main.TextENG: ``...I beg of you.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13690. Will you please help just a little with my curry...``
``Ahahahaha!@k@vS19/02/500200025. No.@k@vS19/02/500200026. This is one of our club activities!@k@vS19/02/500200027. Rena won't lose~!``

Main.TextJPN: ぐ、部活モードになればどんなにやさしいレナでも敵だもんな…。
Main.TextENG: Ugh, when she enters Club Mode, even the normally kind Rena becomes an enemy...

Main.TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんはリンゴなんかも煮込んでるようだ。@k…うぅ、…本格派っぽい。
Main.TextENG: Looks like Rika-chan is cooking apples as well.@k ...Uggh ...she's like a pro at this.

Main.TextJPN: 魅音はどうだ…？
Main.TextENG: How about Mion?

Main.TextJPN: 「わ、魅音てめぇ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13710.　そりゃ何だよ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13720.　ハンバーグなんてどこから！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wha-- Mion you--!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13710. What the heck is that!?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13720. Where did you get meat from!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「行事予定表で今日のことを予め知ってたからね。@k@vS19/03/500300024.…下ごしらえはばっちりってわけよ。@k@vS19/03/500300025.……私のカレーは…ゴージャスに行くよ～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``I predicted what we would be doing today by looking at the schedule.@k@vS19/03/500300024. ...So I prepared accordingly.@k@vS19/03/500300025. ....My curry is going to be... maaaahvelous~!!``

Main.TextJPN: 見ると…魅音は自宅から持ってきた野菜やらスパイスやら具材やらを…たくさん広げていた！！
Main.TextENG: Upon closer inspection, it looks like Mion brought her own vegetables and spices and other ingredients... they were spread all over the place!!

Main.TextJPN: こいつ…今日の為に…家から材料の持ち込みをー！！！
Main.TextENG: Mion... just for today... you brought all this stuff from your house!!!

Main.TextJPN: 「い、異議ありッ！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13740.　先生、こんなのありですかぁあぁあッ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``O-Objection!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13740. Chie-sensei, there's no way this is allowed, is iiiit!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「異議を却下します。@k@vS19/22/501400014.おいしいカレーが出来れば先生は何でもＯＫです☆」
Main.TextENG: ``Objection overruled.@k@vS19/22/501400014. As long as it makes for delicious curry anything goes☆.``

Main.TextJPN: ぐ、……あの真面目な先生が語尾に『☆』をつけるなんて…！！
Main.TextENG: Ugh. For that normally serious teacher to go so far as to append a star to the end of her sentence!!

Main.TextJPN: …噂通り、筋金入りのカレーバカだ…。
Main.TextENG: Just as the rumors said... she's a through-and-through curry freak...

``Rena and Rika-chan are naturally-gifted chefs!@k@vS19/03/500300027. I've come with thorough preparations!!@k@vS19/03/500300028. ...And?@k@vS19/03/500300029. Kei-chan, what about you?@k@vS19/03/500300030. Hehehehe...!!``

Main.TextJPN: ……ダメだ…。@k料理という長丁場では…野菜の皮むきなんて一部でしかない。
Main.TextENG: ...It's hopeless...@k In the grand scheme of cooking... peeling the vegetables is only a small part of it.

Main.TextJPN: ……俺がクリアーしなくてはならない関門は…あまりに多く、…そして高い！！
Main.TextENG: ...The hurdles I must overcome are just too numerous... and too high!!

Main.TextJPN: 「……前原さん、こっちこっち！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Maebara-san, over here!``

Main.TextJPN: 声を掛けられて振り返ると…向こうで呼んでるのはさっきの後輩、富田くんと岡村くんだった。
Main.TextENG: Turning around, I saw the voices calling me belonged to the two underclassmen from earlier, Tomita-kun and Okamura-kun.

Main.TextJPN: 「何だよお前ら。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13760.……ん？@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13770.　そのナベは何だよ。お前らの班のか？」
Main.TextENG: ``What's up, you guys?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13760. ...Hmm?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13770. What's up with that pot? Is that from your group?``

Main.TextJPN: 「これ、気付かれない内に前原さんのナベとすり替えて下さい。@k@vS19/25/502500005.…うちの女子のカレーなら、前原さんが作るよりは出来はいいと思います」
Main.TextENG: ``Switch this with your pot before somebody notices.@k@vS19/25/502500005. ...I think that the curry the girls from our group made, at the very least, is better than what you could make.``

Main.TextJPN: …お、お前ら……、…俺のために…？！
Main.TextENG: ...Y-You guys... ...for me...!?

Main.TextJPN: 「か、勘違いしないで下さいよ。@k@vS19/24/502400008.僕たち…前原さんに勝ってもらわないと……その、」
Main.TextENG: ``D-Don't get the wrong idea.@k@vS19/24/502400008. I-If you don't win then we.... that is...``

Main.TextJPN: そうだったな。
Main.TextENG: Oh, that's right.

Main.TextJPN: 俺が勝たなきゃ、沙都子＆梨花ちゃんのカレーを食わせるって話はお流れになってしまうからな…！！
Main.TextENG: If I don't win, then the talk of eating Satoko and Rika-chan's curry goes right out the window!!

Main.TextJPN: お前らも…牙を剥けるようになったか…！
Main.TextENG: It seems like... you guys are getting riled up about this too...!

Main.TextJPN: 「すまん！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13790.　世話になる！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13800.　……だが、お前らのグループの女子がよく許したな？」
Main.TextENG: ``Sorry!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13790. I'm in your debt!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13800. ...But, I'm surprised the girls in your group agreed to this.``

Main.TextJPN: 「前原さん。@k@vS19/25/502500007.…俺たちも…本気ってことです…！」
Main.TextENG: ``Maebara-san.@k@vS19/25/502500007. ...We're also... serious about this!``

Main.TextJPN: 日直３回交代。@k……彼らは…俺の勝利のために…代償を払ったのだ……！！！
Main.TextENG: Filling in on day duty three times.@k ...These guys... to assure me victory... have paid the price...!!!

Main.TextJPN: 後輩たちの燃える眼差し…！！
Main.TextENG: That gaze filled with burning conviction from my underclassmen...!!

Main.TextJPN: あぁ、俺はひとりで戦ってるんじゃない。
Main.TextENG: Yeah, I'm not fighting this alone.

Main.TextJPN: …みんなで戦ってるんだ！！！
Main.TextENG: ...I'm fighting this with everyone!!!

Main.TextJPN: 「任せておけー！！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13820.　腹は空かせておけよ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13830.絶対に食わせてやるからなー！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Leave it to me!!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13820. Save some room, boys.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13830. I'll definitely let you eat your fill!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「「お待ち申し上げておりまッす！！」」
Main.TextENG: ````We shall be eagerly awaiting your victory!!````

Main.TextJPN: ガス台だから火加減はらくちんだ。
Main.TextENG: It's a gas stove, so controlling the heat is easy.

Main.TextJPN: あとはこのまましばらく煮込むだけ。@kカレーのいいにおいが漂い始める…。
Main.TextENG: All that's left is to let it stew a bit.@k The delicious smell of curry began wafting upwards...

Main.TextJPN: 後輩二人組の班のナベは確かに凝っていた。
Main.TextENG: The pot gifted to me by my two underclassmen certainly drew some double-takes.

Main.TextJPN: 様子を見に来たレナが驚いたくらいだから、悪くないどころかかなりいい感じらしい。
Main.TextENG: Rena even looked surprised when she came to take a look, so it must be pretty good.

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭ちゃん、やるじゃない。@k@vS19/03/500300032.これは…最後までわからない勝負になったねぇ！」
Main.TextENG: ``....Kei-chan, you're pretty good.@k@vS19/03/500300032. It look like this'll be a good match right to the bitter end!``

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一くんのカレー、レナも食べてみたくなっちゃうなぁ。なっちゃうなぁ～！」
Main.TextENG: ``Rena wants to eat Keiichi-kun's curry, curry!``

Main.TextJPN: 「レナのカレーも魅音のカレーも、…みんな強敵だよ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13850.俺の最善は尽くしたが…結果はどうか……」
Main.TextENG: ``Rena's curry and Mion's curry too... everybody is a worthy opponent.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13850. I've done my very best... but I'm not sure of the outcome...``

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一さん、梨花が呼んでますわよ。@k@vS19/04/500400023.行ってあげてでございますわ」
Main.TextENG: ``Keiichi-san, Rika's calling you.@k@vS19/04/500400023. Go see what she wants.``

Main.TextJPN: え？@k　梨花ちゃんが？@k　何だろうな。@k…まぁいいや。@kついでに敵情視察もして来よう！
Main.TextENG: What?@k Rika-chan's calling me?@k What could it be?@k ...Well, whatever.@k ...While I'm at it I can gather some intelligence on the enemy.

Main.TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんはナベの前で地面にラクガキをしていた。
Main.TextENG: Rika-chan was doodling on the ground in front of the pot.

Main.TextJPN: …あとは時間をかけて煮込むだけだもんな。@kそれでも火の側を離れないとは実に感心だ。
Main.TextENG: ...Because all that's left is to let it stew.@k ...Even then, it's good to know that she doesn't leave the stove unattended.

Main.TextJPN: 「よ、梨花ちゃんの方はどんな具合だい？」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey Rika-chan, how's yours doing?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……カレーさんなのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...It's Mr. Curry.``

Main.TextJPN: …へ？@k　…梨花ちゃんが怪しげなラクガキをし、それをカレーさんだと紹介する。
Main.TextENG: ...Huh?@k ...Rika-chan was doodling something strange, and introduced it as Mr. Curry.

Main.TextJPN: 「……カレーさんはすごいのです。@k@vS19/05/500500011.目からビームも出ます。@k@vS19/05/500500012.…びーーーー」
Main.TextENG: ``...Mr. Curry is amazing.@k@vS19/05/500500011. He shoots beams from his eyes.@k@vS19/05/500500012. ...Pew pew.``

Main.TextJPN: カレーさんの目からビーム……らしい。
Main.TextENG: Apparently Mr. Curry shoots beams from his eyes.

Main.TextJPN: 木の棒でビームを描き、俺の足元へ線をなぞる。@k……これって、俺がビームに撃たれたということか？
Main.TextENG: Drawing a beam with a stick, she etched a line towards my feet.@k ...Does this mean, I've been shot with a laser?

Main.TextJPN: 「ぅおおおぉおぉお！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13880.　バリアー！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13890.　ビーム反射ーッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Uwhoaaaaaa!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13880. Barrier!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13890. Beam Reflect!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 俺も木の棒を取り、ビームの線を跳ね返し、カレーさんに直撃させる！！
Main.TextENG: I took another stick in my hand, and reflected the beam, striking Mr. Curry!!

Main.TextJPN: 「……カレーさんのお腹からはミサイルも撃てるのです。@k@vS19/05/500500014.……びしゅーー」
Main.TextENG: ``Mr. Curry can shoot missiles from his stomach.@k@vS19/05/500500014. ...Psheewww.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ぉりゃああぁ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13910.　前原超電磁バリヤー！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13920.　そして反撃のビーム！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Hooowaaaahhh!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13910. Maebara Super Electromagnetic Barrier!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13920. And Retaliatory Beam!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……カレーさんはビームエネルギーを吸収して波動砲を撃てるのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...Mr. Curry absorbs the beam energy and fires his Impulse Wave Cannon.``

Main.TextJPN: 俺と梨花ちゃんは木の棒でがりがりと地面にラクガキをし合い、壮絶な戦争にしばし酔いしれる。@k…………………だが待て。
Main.TextENG: Rika-chan and I scratched at the ground, thoroughly engrossed in our doodle war.@k ....Wait a moment.

Main.TextJPN: 「なぁ梨花ちゃん。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13940.…俺に何か用があって呼んだんじゃないのか？」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey, Rika-chan.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13940. ...You called me here for a reason, right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……はい呼びましたですよ。@k@vS19/05/500500017.…でももうご用は終わっているのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...Yes, I called you.@k@vS19/05/500500017. ...But I've already fulfilled my purpose.``

Main.TextJPN: その時…背筋にぞくりと…悪寒。@k………ご用はもう…終わってる？！
Main.TextENG: At that moment, a chill ran up my spine.@k ...Already fulfilled... her purpose!?
``They, they got me!!!!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 自分のナベへと駆け戻ると…そこには案の定、沙都子の姿が！！！
Main.TextENG: Headed back to my pot... standing there, just as I feared, was Satoko!!!

Main.TextJPN: 問答無用でその後頭部に二段踵落としを叩き込む！
Main.TextENG: With no questions asked, I dropkicked the back of her head!

Main.TextJPN: 「な、何をしますのー！！！@k@vS19/04/500400025.　レディの頭を何だとお思いですのー！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wh-Wha-What do you think you're doing!!!@k@vS19/04/500400025. You know better than to do that to a lady's head!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「んな事はどうでもいい！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13970.　まさか沙都子、俺のカレーに何か混ぜたんじゃ…！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Who cares about that!?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13970. Satoko, did you mix something in with my curr—!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「失礼な。@k@vS19/04/500400027.…そこまで落ちぶれてはおりませんわ。@k@vS19/04/500400028.…こう見えても私、フェアですのよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``How impertinent.@k@vS19/04/500400027. ...I haven't fallen that far.@k@vS19/04/500400028. ...Despite what you may think, I'm a fair person, you know.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……じゃあこの、よくわからない並べ方をしてあるシャモジとかお皿とかは何だ！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13990.　こんな不安定な置き方をして、倒れたらどうすんだよ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Then what's this incomprehensible line of ladles and plates!?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI13990. Leaving them all in these unstable positions... if they fall over, what will you do!?``

Main.TextJPN: その時、そよそよ…と風が吹き、立て掛けてあったおたまがぱたり、と倒れた。
Main.TextENG: At that moment, a gentle breeze blew by, knocking over a ladle that was stood up on its end.

Main.TextJPN: 倒れたおたまはドミノ倒しのように、隣の炊具を次々と倒していく。
Main.TextENG: The ladle, like a domino, fell over and knocked over the next cooking utensil in a row.

Main.TextJPN: パタパタパタパタ。@kガチャンガチャン、ドタパタドタパタ……
Main.TextENG: *whap whap whap whap*@k *clank clank*@k *thud thud*

Main.TextJPN: 「これは芸術だなぁ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14010.…そう言えば昔、テレビでドミノ倒し世界記録に挑戦なんてのが流行ったよなぁ」
Main.TextENG: ``This is Art.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14010. ...Come to think of it, domino world record challenges were quite the rage on television a while back.``
``K-Kei-chan!!!@k@vS19/03/500300034. The frying pan!!!``

Main.TextJPN: え？　と思う間もなかった。
Main.TextENG: I didn't even have time to react.

Main.TextJPN: …ドミノ倒しはまな板を倒し、フライパンを倒し……その先には俺の鍋が……。
Main.TextENG: ...The chain reaction knocked over a cutting board... ...Then a frying pan... ...The next after that was... My pot...

Main.TextJPN: ズガシャーーーン…！！
Main.TextENG: *CRASH*

Main.TextJPN: フライパンがその重量を活かしたパワフルな攻撃で…俺の鍋をひっくり返す！！
Main.TextENG: The frypan struck my pot full-force, tipping it over!!

Main.TextJPN: 無惨にも中身がぶちまけられ…、俺の力作カレーは今や校庭が試食中だ……。
Main.TextENG: The contents cruelly spilled out... and now my masterpiece was being sampled by the schoolyard...

Main.TextJPN: 唖然呆然……。
Main.TextENG: I stared, dumbfounded...

Main.TextJPN: あまりの美しいトラップワークに一瞬、現実感を喪失してしまう…。
Main.TextENG: It was such a beautiful and elaborate mousetrap that for a moment, I lost touch with reality.

Main.TextJPN: 「あらあら大惨事ですわね～！@k@vS19/04/500400030.　私は何もしてませんのよ？@k@vS19/04/500400031.　をーっほっほっほっほ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh my oh my, this is a catastrophe~!@k@vS19/04/500400030. I didn't do anything, you hear me?@k@vS19/04/500400031. Ooohohohoho!!``

Main.TextJPN: ……最後の最後に…油断した…！！
Main.TextENG: ...At the very last moment... I had let my guard down...!!

Main.TextJPN: 料理のできない沙都子を無視し過ぎてた…！！
Main.TextENG: I ignored the culinarily incompetent Satoko for far too long...!!

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子には料理ができなくても…こういう方法で戦列に加わることができたのだ！
Main.TextENG: Even if she couldn't cook, Satoko still had this method of fighting back!

Main.TextJPN: その時、向こうで自分の鍋の味見をしていたレナが悲鳴を上げた。
Main.TextENG: Just then, Rena, who had been sampling her own pot, let out a scream.

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、あれーー？！？！@k@vS19/02/500200030.　レナのカレー…しょっぱいよ？　しょっぱいよ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wh-Whaat!?!?!@k@vS19/02/500200030. Rena's curry is... salty? Salty!?``

Main.TextJPN: レナもすでにやられた後だったか…？！@k　じゃあ魅音は…？！
Main.TextENG: Was Rena also sabotaged...!?@k Then what about Mion...!?

Main.TextJPN: 「私のはご飯がしょっぱいーーーッ！！@k@vS19/03/500300036.　やられたぁあぁあぁああ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``My rice is saltyyyy!!@k@vS19/03/500300036. I've been had!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「をーっほっほっほっほ！！！@k@vS19/04/500400033.　これで邪魔者は戦う前に全て一掃でございますのよ～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ooohohohoho!!!@k@vS19/04/500400033. With this all the obstacles in my way have been taken care of before the fight even begins!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……せっかくの力作が台無しなのです。@k@vS19/05/500500019.かぁいそかぁいそなのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...All that effort wasted.@k@vS19/05/500500019. So sad, so sad.``

Main.TextJPN: 「かぁいそかぁいそですわよ～」
Main.TextENG: ``So very very sad~``

Main.TextJPN: 呆然とする俺の頭を梨花ちゃんと沙都子が存分になでなでしていた…。
Main.TextENG: Rika-chan and Satoko rubbed my dumbfounded head to their hearts' content...

Main.TextJPN: 机が並べられ、いよいよ食事と採点の時間がやってきた。
Main.TextENG: Pushing the desks together, it was about time for the meals to be judged.

Main.TextJPN: おいしそうなカレーのにおいが校庭いっぱいに広がる…。
Main.TextENG: The delicious odor of curry spread throughout the courtyard...

Main.TextJPN: 来賓席に、日頃お世話になっている営林署の人たちが案内されてきた。
Main.TextENG: The members of the Forestry Service, to whom we owed gratitude for their daily work, were guided to their seats.

Main.TextJPN: 校長先生がセレモニー的な挨拶をし、続けて先生が、カレー勝負があるので、ぜひ採点してほしいとお願いする。
Main.TextENG: The principal gave a bit of a ceremonial introduction. Next, the teacher expressed her desire for them to judge the curry contest.

Main.TextJPN: 営林署のおっさん方はそういうノリが好きらしく、『よし来た！』と気勢を上げている。
Main.TextENG: The men from the Forestry Service seemed to like that kind of thing, and gave their enthusiastic approval.

Main.TextJPN: 「さて、皆さんできましたね～。@k@vS19/22/501400016.ではこれから審査員の皆さんと校長先生と私で試食をしますからね～！」
Main.TextENG: ``Well then, is everybody finished~?@k@vS19/22/501400016. We'll now have all the judges sample your cooking~!``

Main.TextJPN: クラスのみんなが力作のカレーを盛り付けて机に並べていく。
Main.TextENG: Everybody in the class brought up their painstakingly made curry and arranged them on the desk.

Main.TextJPN: 部活のメンバーでまともに仕上げられたのは梨花ちゃんたちだけだ…。
Main.TextENG: The only club members who managed a decent result were Rika-chan's group...

Main.TextJPN: レナは失敗カレーであることを知りつつ盛り付ける。@kひどい点数になるのは承知でだ。
Main.TextENG: Knowing full-well it was a failure, Rena plated her curry for the judges.@k She already knew she was going to get a low score.

Main.TextJPN: だが…それでもまだ盛り付けられるだけましだろう。
Main.TextENG: But... at least she was still able to serve hers.

Main.TextJPN: 俺や魅音のカレーは完全に破壊され、食卓に並べることすらかなわない…。
Main.TextENG: Both Mion's and my curry were completely obliterated, so we couldn't even line them up on the table...

Main.TextJPN: 先生たちや審査員の営林署の人たちが、低学年のカレーから順に試食している。
Main.TextENG: The judges started from the curry made by the lower grades.

Main.TextJPN: そしてうまいだの甘いだの、力作だの個性的だのと論議に花を咲かせていた。
Main.TextENG: They had a lively discussion, praising the food.

Main.TextJPN: そしていよいよ……俺たち高学年のカレーへ。
Main.TextENG: Finally... it was our curry's turn.

Main.TextJPN: 「次は竜宮くんのカレーであるな。@k@vS19/00/503200005.うむ。@k@vS19/00/503200006.…実に美味そうである！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Next up is Ryuugu-kun's curry.@k@vS19/00/503200005. Yes.@k@vS19/00/503200006. ...This looks quite appetizing!!``

Main.TextJPN: 校長先生はホクホク顔でレナのしょっぱいカレーを頬張る…！！
Main.TextENG: The principal cheerfully shoveled a spoonful of Rena's salty curry into his mouth...!!

Main.TextJPN: もちろん、その顔はすぐに陰る。
Main.TextENG: Of course, his expression immediately changed.

Main.TextJPN: 「あらあらあら…、竜宮さんどうしちゃったんですか？@k@vS19/22/501400018.　途中まではあんなにおいしそうだったのに…」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh my... what happened, Ryuugu-san?@k@vS19/22/501400018. It seemed so delicious when you were cooking it...``

Main.TextJPN: 期待していたのか、先生はがっかりしたようだった。
Main.TextENG: Chie-sensei must have had some expectations, judging from her disappointment.

Main.TextJPN: 「はぅ……、す…すみません…。@k@vS19/02/500200032.間違えて……お塩を一袋入れちゃって……」
Main.TextENG: ``Hau.... I-I'm sorry...@k@vS19/02/500200032. I might have added... a bag of salt by accident...``

Main.TextJPN: 審査員たちも一口食べただけで顔をしかめてしまう。@k……気の毒に。
Main.TextENG: The rest of the judges grimaced after they each had a bite.@k ...I feel sorry for them.

Main.TextJPN: 「失敗こそ成功の調味料である！！@k@vS19/00/503200008.　次回に期待するぞ！@k@vS19/00/503200009.　頑張りたまえ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Failure is but the seasoning for success!!@k@vS19/00/503200008. I'm looking forward to next time!@k@vS19/00/503200009. Do your best!!``

Main.TextJPN: そう言い、塩カレーを丸呑みにして完食を決めた校長の背中に漢を感じた。
Main.TextENG: Saying that, the principal devoured the rest of the oversalted curry in one go. Truly a man amongst men.

Main.TextJPN: レナ、轟沈。
Main.TextENG: Rena was down and out.

Main.TextJPN: 攻撃力は見事だったが、ガードが甘かったのが敗因か…。
Main.TextENG: Her offensive capabilities were something else, but she was defeated due to her weak defense.

Main.TextJPN: 「……では。@k@vS19/05/500500021.次はボクたちのをご賞味いただくのですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...Well then.@k@vS19/05/500500021. Please savor our curry next.``

Main.TextJPN: 「古手さんの班のカレーもとても頑張っていますね！@k@vS19/22/501400020.　どれどれ。@k@vS19/22/501400021.……うん。@k@vS19/22/501400022.素朴だけど、これはとてもおいしく出来てます☆」
Main.TextENG: ``I see that Furude-san's group put a lot of effort into their curry!@k@vS19/22/501400020. Let's see here.@k@vS19/22/501400021. ...Hmm.@k@vS19/22/501400022. It's simple, but very nicely done☆.``

Main.TextJPN: 直前のレナの塩カレーのこともあり、審査員たちの評価は非常に高い…！
Main.TextENG: There was also the incident with Rena's salted curry right before this, so the judge's assessment was extraordinarily high...!

Main.TextJPN: 非常にどころか…ひょっとして今日の中で一番おいしいのでは？
Main.TextENG: Maybe not just extraordinary... but perhaps today's forerunner?

Main.TextJPN: 審査員たちが熱の入った議論を始める。
Main.TextENG: The judges began a heated debate.

Main.TextJPN: その中、一人の審査員がため息を吐きながらニンジンの塊をスプーンでどかした。
Main.TextENG: One of those judges let out a sigh as he removed a chunk of carrot with his spoon.

Main.TextJPN: 「う～ん、この子のカレーも結構悪くないけどな。@k@vS19/00/work50002.……俺、ニンジン嫌いなんだよな」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah, this kid's curry really isn't half bad...@k@vS19/00/work50002. ...but, I don't like carrots, you see.``

Main.TextJPN: カレーにニンジンはド定番だと思うが。@k…人には好みがあるってことだよな。
Main.TextENG: Personally, I think that carrots are a staple of curry.@k ...But I guess to each their own.

Main.TextJPN: だが、それを見た梨花ちゃんは彼の作業着の胸にある名札を読み取り、口を開いた。
Main.TextENG: However, seeing that, Rika-chan read the nameplate on the chest of his coveralls, and began to speak.

Main.TextJPN: 「……だめですよ恭司。@k@vS19/05/500500023.ニンジンを残してはいけません」
Main.TextENG: ``...That's no good, Kyouji.@k@vS19/05/500500023. You have to eat your carrots.``

Main.TextJPN: 突然何を言い出すのか…。@kみんながぎょっとして梨花ちゃんを見る。
Main.TextENG: What is she saying all of a sudden...?@k Everybody turned to Rika-chan with a stunned look.

Main.TextJPN: だが……梨花ちゃんのそれは……クリティカルだったのだ。
Main.TextENG: But... ...What Rika-chan just did... Was super effective.

Main.TextJPN: ニンジン嫌いのその審査員は…ボロボロと涙をこぼしながらカレーを頬張りだす！
Main.TextENG: The carrot-hating judge began stuffing his face with curry while tears streamed down his face.

Main.TextJPN: 「……恭司。@k@vS19/05/500500025.御代わりありますですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``......Kyouji.@k@vS19/05/500500025. There's seconds if you want them.``

Main.TextJPN: ぅ～～、お母ちゃぁああぁあぁん！！
Main.TextENG: *sob* ``MOMMMMMMYYYYYYYY!!``

Main.TextJPN: そう泣き叫びながらカレーを頬張る頬張る！
Main.TextENG: While crying like that he continued to shovel curry into his mouth!

Main.TextJPN: そう。@k…梨花ちゃんのカレーは素朴なんじゃない。
Main.TextENG: That's right.@k ...Rika-chan's curry was by no means 'simple.'

Main.TextJPN: それは…お袋の味のカレーだったのだ！！！
Main.TextENG: No... that curry had the taste of a mother's cooking!

Main.TextJPN: ニンジン嫌いの審査員すらもＫＯし、梨花ちゃんの評価は揺るがない。
Main.TextENG: With the carrot-hating judge out of the picture, Rika-chan's assessment was unanimous.

Main.TextJPN: 「をっほっほ。@k@vS19/04/500400036.梨花のカレーには誰もかないませんのよ～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ohoho.@k@vS19/04/500400036. Nobody can stand up to Rika's curry!!``

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子が高らかに笑い勝利を宣言しようとした時…！
Main.TextENG: Satoko let off a shrill laugh as she declared victory, but at that moment...!

Main.TextJPN: 「騙されてはなりません審査員の皆々様方！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Don't be fooled, my esteemed judges!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「貧乏くささをお袋の味と錯覚させるなどまやかしもいいとこ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Don't be deceived into thinking that this meager slop is the taste only a mother can provide!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「皆様方が本当に食べたかったのは…こういうカレーじゃない？！」
Main.TextENG: ``What you people actually wanted to eat... was this kind of curry, wasn't it!?``

Main.TextJPN: をぉおおぉおおッ！！！！
Main.TextENG: Ooooooohhh!!!!

Main.TextJPN: いつの間にか完璧に盛り付けられた…魅音のカレー！
Main.TextENG: All of a sudden, in all its perfect glory... Mion's curry!

Main.TextJPN: 審査員だけでなく、先生や後輩たち、もちろん俺も…感嘆にどよめく！！
Main.TextENG: Not only the judges, but the teacher, the underclassmen, and of course myself... could only gasp in admiration!!

Main.TextJPN: デミグラスソースのハンバーグに見目鮮やかなサラダ付き…！！
Main.TextENG: Hamburg steak with a demi-glace sauce, and a fresh salad...!!

Main.TextJPN: これはセットだ！！
Main.TextENG: It's a set!!

Main.TextJPN: コースと呼ぶに相応しい！！@k　完璧な…完璧な仕上りだッ！！！
Main.TextENG: It wouldn't be stretching it to say that this was a full course meal!!@k It's perfect... perfectly made!!!
``A-Amazing, amazing!!@k@vS19/02/500200034. Mii-chan, you're amazing!@k@vS19/02/500200035. Mii-chan, you're amazing!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子も驚愕する。
Main.TextENG: Satoko was also shocked.

Main.TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんでさえ驚きを隠せない…！！
Main.TextENG: Even Rika-chan couldn't hide her surprise.

Main.TextJPN: 食べる前から…勝負は決したようなものだった。
Main.TextENG: It seems the victor was decided without even needing a taste.

Main.TextJPN: もちろんハンバーグは手ごね。
Main.TextENG: Of course the hamburger was hand-kneaded.

Main.TextJPN: ドレッシングも自家製の本格派。
Main.TextENG: The salad also had a homestyle dressing, but of professional quality.

Main.TextJPN: カレーだって…ミクロン程の隙もないッ！！！
Main.TextENG: And the curry, not even a micron of grit!!!

Main.TextJPN: 「とても美味しい…。@k@vS19/22/501400024.実に豊かな味わいですよ園崎さん！」
Main.TextENG: ``This is sublime...@k@vS19/22/501400024. Truly a taste to savor, Sonozaki-san!

Main.TextJPN: 「このカレーこそ…インド６０００年の英知と日本人の食文化の美しい融和の生きた証…。@k@vS19/22/501400026.…先生、感激です！@k@vS19/22/501400027.　これは満点の仕上りですね！！@k@vS19/22/501400028.　百点をあげちゃいます」
Main.TextENG: This curry is no doubt... a living testimony to 6000 years of Indian knowledge in beautiful harmony with Japanese cuisine...@k@vS19/22/501400026. ...I'm elated!@k@vS19/22/501400027. This deserves full marks!!@k@vS19/22/501400028. I'm giving it 100 points.``

Main.TextJPN: 「いえいえどういたしまして～。@k@vS19/03/500300041.クラス委員長として模範を示したまでです」
Main.TextENG: ``Aww, you're welcome~.@k@vS19/03/500300041. I'm just trying to set an example as class representative.``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音がうやうやしくお辞儀をする。@k…そして俺たちにニヤリとウィンク！
Main.TextENG: Mion bowed politely.@k ...And then winked at us with a smirk on her face!

Main.TextJPN: 「……ボクの…負けなのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...I admit... defeat.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そ、そんなはずはありませんわ…！！@k@vS19/04/500400038.　確かに飯ごうに細工をしましたのに！！」
Main.TextENG: ``T-There's no way this is happening...!!@k@vS19/04/500400038. I'm certain I sabotaged that pot of rice!!``

Main.TextJPN: そうだ。
Main.TextENG: That's right.

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子が魅音の飯ごうに塩をブチ込んで台無しにしたはず！！！
Main.TextENG: Satoko had dumped salt into Mion's rice cooker, which should have ruined it!!!

Main.TextJPN: その時、何かを直感的にひらめき、俺は自分の飯ごうに振り返る。
Main.TextENG: At that moment, it hit me. I spun back towards my own canister.

Main.TextJPN: ……そ、そういうことかぁああぁあぁあッ！！
Main.TextENG: ...T-That's whHhyyyyYYYyyy!!

Main.TextJPN: いつの間にか俺の飯ごうが開けられ、しゃもじで中身がごっそりと抜き取られていた。
Main.TextENG: At some point, my cooking canister had been opened, its contents completely emptied.

Main.TextJPN: 「み、魅音めぇええぇえ！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14030.　俺のご飯を使いやがったなぁあぁああッ！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14040.　ずるいぞぉおぉおぉ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14050.　お前のカレーも半分寄越せぇえぇえ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``D-Damn you MioooooooOOooon!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14030. You used my riiiIIiiiiiiiiiiice!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14040. That's no faaaAAaaiiirr!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14050. Hand over half of your cuuuUUurry!!``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音はチッチッチと指をふり、不敵な笑みを浮かべた。
Main.TextENG: Mion clucked her tongue and waved her finger at me as a smirk washed over her face.

Main.TextJPN: 「おぉっと圭ちゃん、それは甘えてるよ。@k@vS19/03/500300043.この最後の土壇場を、圭ちゃんは諦めた。@k@vS19/03/500300044.私は諦めなかった。@k@vS19/03/500300045.そういう差でしょ？@k@vS19/03/500300046.　勝負は捨てたらオシマイってこと！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Whoa there, Kei-chan, you're not taking this seriously enough.@k@vS19/03/500300043. You gave up at the last moment.@k@vS19/03/500300044. I didn't.@k@vS19/03/500300045. That's the difference between us.@k@vS19/03/500300046. As soon as you give up, it's all over!!``

Main.TextJPN: ぐ……！！　文字通り、ぐぅの音も出ない…！
Main.TextENG: Gah...!! I couldn't even properly voice my shame...!

Main.TextJPN: 「魅ぃちゃん、圭一くん可哀想だよ。@k@vS19/02/500200037.…ちょっとくらいなら分けてあげても…」
Main.TextENG: ``Mii-chan, I feel sorry for Keiichi-kun.@k@vS19/02/500200037. ...Just give him at least a little...``

Main.TextJPN: 「いいのいいの。@k@vS19/03/500300048.これは授業料だよ。@k@vS19/03/500300049.圭ちゃんは今、勝負を最後まで捨ててはいけないことを学んだの。…ね！」
Main.TextENG: ``It's fine, it's fine.@k@vS19/03/500300048. This is a lesson.@k@vS19/03/500300049. Kei-chan just learned that you shouldn't give up on the contest until it's all over... right?``

Main.TextJPN: く、悔しいが……魅音の言うとおりだ！
Main.TextENG: It loathes me to say it but... Mion is right!

Main.TextJPN: 勝負を早々に諦めた自らの甘さ…！！
Main.TextENG: To give up so quickly on the match was my own folly...!!

Main.TextJPN: それを気付かせてくれた魅音に…むしろ感謝すべきなのだ…！
Main.TextENG: For Mion to have brought that to my attention... I should actually be thankful to her...!

Main.TextJPN: じゃあ…今この状況でも勝負を諦めてはいけないってことか？！
Main.TextENG: Well then... did that mean that even in this situation, I shouldn't give up!?

Main.TextJPN: 「カレーは鍋ごとひっくり返し、ご飯すらも残ってない…。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14070.この状況で…どう勝負を諦めるなって言うんだよ…ッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``My curry was overturned while it was still in the pot, and I don't even have any rice left...@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14070. How in the blazes am I not supposed to lose hope in this situation!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「ま、前原さん……」
Main.TextENG: ``Ma-Maebara-san......``

Main.TextJPN: いつの間にか、富田くんと岡村くんが来ていた。
Main.TextENG: Tomita-kun and Okamura-kun suddenly appeared.

Main.TextJPN: くそ…！！
Main.TextENG: Dammit...!!

Main.TextJPN: 後輩たちだって頑張ってくれたのに…！！
Main.TextENG: Even though my protégés had tried so hard...!!

Main.TextJPN: 期待に応えられなかった！！
Main.TextENG: I wasn't able to meet their expectations!!
``I-It was an accident.@k@vS19/25/502500010. ...There was nothing you could do.``

Main.TextJPN: 落胆する後輩二人…。@kく、……あっさり負けを認めたらダメだ。@k俺は先輩なんだ！！@k　後輩たちに見せた夢のカケラを…俺が拾わなくてどうするッ！！
Main.TextENG: Both of them were dejected...@k Gah... I couldn't accept defeat so easily.@k I was their senior!!@k What would I be if I didn't pick up the broken pieces of the dream I had shown them!!

Main.TextJPN: たった今…魅音に習ったばかりだろッ？！@k　勝負を捨てるな！@k　最後の一瞬まで！
Main.TextENG: I just learned it from Mion just now, didn't I?@k Don't throw away the contest!@k Not until the last moment!

Main.TextJPN: 「考えろ前原圭一！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14090.　考えるんだ前原圭一！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14100.　カレーを作る方法じゃない、勝負に勝つ方法をだ…ッ！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14110.　…………むむむ……かぁああぁあぁあッ！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Think, Keiichi Maebara!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14090. Think!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14100. Not about how to make more curry, about how to win the match...!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14110. ......Hmmmm... AaaaaAAaaaaAah!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 一手思いつく。
Main.TextENG: I had an idea.

Main.TextJPN: ……逆転できる自信はないが、座して死ぬくらいなら賭す価値がある！
Main.TextENG: ...I didn't think it could turn the tables, but it was better than nothing!

Main.TextJPN: 「富田くん、手を洗って来い。手伝ってくれッ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14130.　岡村くんには探してきてほしいものがあるんだ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Tomita-kun, come and wash your hands. Help me out!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14130. Okamura-kun, there's something I want you to find!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「「うぉっす！　了解です！！」」
Main.TextENG: ````Okay! Gotcha!!````

Main.TextJPN: 後輩たちが指示を受け辺りに散る。
Main.TextENG: Both of them dispersed after receiving these instructions.

Main.TextJPN: 「…ほぅ。@k@vS19/03/500300051.最後に圭ちゃんがどう足掻くか。@k@vS19/03/500300052.…見せてもらおうじゃない？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Oh?@k@vS19/03/500300051. How is Kei-chan going to flounder about at the end?@k@vS19/03/500300052. ...Why don't you show me?``

Main.TextJPN: 「往生際の悪い男は嫌われますのよ～？」
Main.TextENG: ``Nobody likes a stubborn fool, you know~?``

Main.TextJPN: 「うるせぇ！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14150.　俺の最後の勝負を黙って見てろッ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14160.　まず魅音、お前の飯ごうをもらうぞ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14170.嫌とは言わせん！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Shut up!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14150. Just sit there and watch the last card I have to play!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14160. First off. Mion, I'll be taking some of your rice.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14170. I won't let you say no!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「………別にいいけど。しょっぱいよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``......I don't really care. It's salty, after all.``

Main.TextJPN: 「レナも手伝っていいよね？@k@vS19/02/500200039.　圭一くん、非常事態だし」
Main.TextENG: ``It's okay if Rena helps too, right?@k@vS19/02/500200039. Keiichi-kun is in trouble right now.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そう言ってもらえるなら心強い！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14190.　じゃあレナ！　……お茶を入れてくれ」
Main.TextENG: ``Hearing you say that is very reassuring!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14190. Well then, Rena! Go make some tea.``

Main.TextJPN: 「はぅ、……信頼されてない～」
Main.TextENG: ``Hau.... he doesn't trust me.``

Main.TextJPN: 「それから沙都子！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14210.　そして梨花ちゃん！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14220.　一騎打ちを申し入れる」
Main.TextENG: ``Next, Satoko!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14210. Also, Rika-chan!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14220. I challenge you to a side bet.``

Main.TextJPN: 「な、何ですってぇええぇええッ？！？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wh-What did you saaaaaAAaaay!?!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……お話を伺いますですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``....We'll listen to your request.``

Main.TextJPN: 俺の為に汗を流してくれた後輩たちのための…唯一の義務だ！
Main.TextENG: This was my duty to my two protégés who shed blood, sweat, and tears for my sake.

Main.TextJPN: 「俺が百点をもらえたら、……沙都子、梨花ちゃん！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14240.　お前らのカレーをいただく」
Main.TextENG: ``Satoko, Rika-chan... If I receive a perfect score...!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14240. I'll be taking your curry.``

Main.TextJPN: 「メシ抜きだっぁあぁああぁああッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Nothing for you to eaaaaAAAaat!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「じょ、冗談もほどほどでございますのよー！！！@k@vS19/04/500400042.　そんなのアカンベ～でございますわよ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Y-You need to know when to stop joking around!!!@k@vS19/04/500400042. I'll be giving a big NO to that!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……いや、いいでしょ沙都子。@k@vS19/03/500300055.受けなよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...No, it's all right, Satoko.@k@vS19/03/500300055. Take him up on it.``

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子の頭をぽんぽんと叩きながら、魅音が堂々とした部長の威厳で言った。
Main.TextENG: Firmly patting the top of Satoko's head, Mion said those words with all the gravitas of a Club President.

Main.TextJPN: 「これだけの致命傷を与えたんでしょ？@k@vS19/03/500300057.　再起なんかあるわけがない。@k@vS19/03/500300058.だから沙都子も堂々としてなよ。@k@vS19/03/500300059.……どう足掻こうと逆転などあるわけがない。@k@vS19/03/500300060.そうでしょ？」
Main.TextENG: ``You handicapped him this much, didn't you?@k@vS19/03/500300057. There's no way he can make up for that.@k@vS19/03/500300058. So meet him head on.@k@vS19/03/500300059. ...No matter how hard he struggles, he's not going to make a comeback.@k@vS19/03/500300060. Right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「むぐぐぐ……そ、そうでございますけど……」
Main.TextENG: ``Grrrr... Th-That may be true, but......``

Main.TextJPN: 「……ボクはいいですよ。@k@vS19/05/500500029.圭一、ファイト、お～です」
Main.TextENG: ``...I don't mind.@k@vS19/05/500500029. Keiichi. Go for it. Yaaay.``

Main.TextJPN: 審査員たちは様々なカレーを食傷気味になりながらも食べ、各人の出来を議論していた。
Main.TextENG: The judges, seemingly growing tired of sampling the various curries, were debating each entry.

Main.TextJPN: ……漏れ聞く限り、魅音の優位は揺るがない…。
Main.TextENG: ...From what little I overheard, it seemed that Mion's impending victory was not in question...

Main.TextJPN: 「そう言えば…、前原くんのカレーはどうなりましたか？@k@vS19/22/501400030.　先生、まだ食べてませんよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``By the way... what happened to Maebara-kun's curry?@k@vS19/22/501400030. I still haven't tried it yet.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……………はい。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14270.俺のカレーはその………鍋がひっくり返ってしまい……」
Main.TextENG: ``.........Yeah.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14270. The pot with my curry in it...... fell over...``
``Hmph.@k@vS19/00/503200011. ...Is that so?@k@vS19/00/503200012. That's a real shame!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…カレーは失いましたが…勝負を失ったわけじゃありません。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14290.…皆さんをうまいと言わせて見せます！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...I may have lost my curry... but that doesn't mean I've lost this contest.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14290. ...I'll have everybody singing my praises!!``

Main.TextJPN: 俺のただならぬ闘気に審査員たちも何事かと集まり始める…！！
Main.TextENG: My combative posturing had drawn the attention of all the judges...!!

Main.TextJPN: 「まずは黙って食って下さい。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14310.……文句はそれから伺いますッ！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14320.　…これが…俺の料理だぁああぁあぁああッ！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``First of all, just be quiet and eat these, please.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14310. ...I'll listen to your complaints after that!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14320. ...This is... My cookiiiIIiiiiiing!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…ま、前原くん…それは………？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Ma-Maebara-kun... that's......?``

Main.TextJPN: 審査員たちは壮絶な前ふりの割りにシンプルなのが登場し、苦笑している。
Main.TextENG: The judges smiled wryly at the simple fare that was quite in contrast to the preceding bravado.

Main.TextJPN: レナは給湯室から持ってきた湯呑にお茶を入れてくれた。
Main.TextENG: Rena poured tea into the cups she had brought over from the break room.

Main.TextJPN: 「ば、…ばかにしてますわぁ！！@k@vS19/04/500400045.　それに…ほら！@k@vS19/04/500400046.　中身も何にもない…ただの塩にぎりではありませんの！！！@k@vS19/04/500400047.　こんなの勝負にもなりませんわぁあぁあ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``He... he's making a mockery of this!!@k@vS19/04/500400045. There... look!@k@vS19/04/500400046. There's not even any filling... it's nothing more than salted onigiri!!!@k@vS19/04/500400047. This isn't even worthy of being called a contest anymore!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「………確かに塩加減は悪くないかもしれないけど……」
Main.TextENG: ``......It's true, the amount of salt might be a little much, but...``

Main.TextJPN: 奇策だとは思うけど…逆転は無理じゃないかな…。レナの目はそう言っている。
Main.TextENG: Rena's expression told me that she thought this was a great idea, but it might still not be enough to win the match...

Main.TextJPN: 「前原さん、本当に…こんなので…逆転できるんですかぁ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Maebara-san, is this... really enough to make a comeback!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「後輩諸君。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14340.よく尽くしてくれた。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14350.……大丈夫。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14360.黙って見てるんだ」
Main.TextENG: ``Gentlemen.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14340. You did well.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14350....It's all right.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14360. Just watch.``

Main.TextJPN: 審査員たちはもぐもぐと頬張り、お茶をすする。
Main.TextENG: The judges were chewing with their mouths full and sipping at the tea.

Main.TextJPN: …うまいと言う者もなければ、感嘆に咽ぶ者もいない。
Main.TextENG: ...Nobody was singing praises or awestruck.

Main.TextJPN: ……ただ黙って、…もりもりと食べるだけ。
Main.TextENG: ...They were just quietly ...chowing down.

Main.TextJPN: 「………圭ちゃんも…卑怯な手を使うようになったねぇ。@k@vS19/03/500300062.…こりゃ…辛いなぁ」
Main.TextENG: ``......It seems that Kei-chan... has learned how to use some rather underhanded tricks.@k@vS19/03/500300062. ...This... might be difficult.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、そうか。@k@vS19/02/500200043.……レナにもわかったよ」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah, that's right.@k@vS19/02/500200043. ......Rena understands that now too.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ど、どういうことですの？！@k@vS19/04/500400049.　何でみんな黙って…あんなにも食べてますの？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wh-What do you mean!?@k@vS19/04/500400049. Why is everybody just quietly... eating that much!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「それはね沙都子ちゃん。@k@vS19/02/500200045.審査員さんたちね、実は……、」
Main.TextENG: ``You see, Satoko-chan.@k@vS19/02/500200045. That's because the judges are actually...``

Main.TextJPN: …カレーに食べ飽きているのだ！
Main.TextENG: ...tired of eating curry!

Main.TextJPN: 審査員だから一応全員分は味見しなくてはならない。
Main.TextENG: Because they were judges, they had to sample each and every offering.

Main.TextJPN: それに小さい子たちが普段の感謝にと言って作ってくれてるんだから@bいちべつ.@<一瞥@>するだけってわけにはいかない。
Main.TextENG: And because they were from small children, because they were made to show their appreciation, they couldn't eat just a little bit of each.

Main.TextJPN: 「男はな、時には味よりも…量を尊ぶこともあるんだよッ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14380b.　その時、味は心震わせるものよりも……素朴であることが望ましい！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Sometimes a man values the amount more than the taste!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14380b. At those times, rather than rich, mind-blowing flavor.... they crave simplicity!!``

Main.TextJPN: 口に出しては言えないけど、実はこれが一番うまいんだよね…。@k審査員たちは苦笑いしながら、目で肯定した。
Main.TextENG: They couldn't say it out loud, but this was the tastiest thing they'd had today...@k I confirmed that by looking at their eyes as the judges smiled wryly.

Main.TextJPN: 「健闘は称えるが…今日はカレー勝負。@k@vS19/00/503200016.……これに点数を与えてよいものなのか」
Main.TextENG: ``I'll praise your efforts, but... today's contest was about curry.@k@vS19/00/503200016. ...I'm not sure we can give a score to this.``

Main.TextJPN: 先生も校長も唸りながら腕を組んでしまう。
Main.TextENG: The teacher and the principal had folded their arms while they pondered the situation.

Main.TextJPN: 後輩たちもそれを聞き…見えかけた逆転の光明が消えていく様子に落胆する…。
Main.TextENG: My underlings, seeing that... saw the small glimmer of hope fade away, and grew dejected.

Main.TextJPN: く…、やっぱりこんなびっくり技じゃダメなのか…？
Main.TextENG: Argh, was this little surprise just not enough...?

Main.TextJPN: 「……諦めるな圭ちゃん」
Main.TextENG: ``...Don't give up, Kei-chan.``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音がぼそりとつぶやく。@k……そうだ。@kここで押さなくてどうするッ！！！
Main.TextENG: Mion whispered quietly.@k ......That's right.@k If I didn't push here...!!!

Main.TextJPN: 「いえ、先生。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14400.採点はして頂きます」
Main.TextENG: ``No.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14400. I'll have you give it a score.

Main.TextJPN: 「カレーとおにぎりを異なって評価することにそもそも致命的な間違いがあります」
Main.TextENG: If you think that curry and onigiri are really that different, you're sorely mistaken.``

Main.TextJPN: 「？？@k@vS19/22/501400033.　前原くん、何を言ってるんですか？@k@vS19/22/501400034.　カレーとおにぎりがなぜ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Huh?@k@vS19/22/501400033. Maebara-kun, what are you saying?@k@vS19/22/501400034. How are they the same!?``

Main.TextJPN: 校長が先生を制する。
Main.TextENG: The principal stopped the teacher.

Main.TextJPN: 俺に最後のチャンスをくれたらしい。
Main.TextENG: It looked like he was giving me one final chance.

Main.TextJPN: 審査員たちもあらかた満腹したのか、俺の口上を黙って待っている…。
Main.TextENG: The judges, having eaten their fill, quietly waited for my statement...

Main.TextJPN: 「本場インドのカレーはナンというパンで食べるそうですね。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14430.ですから、このカレーライスという料理は、それを取り入れアレンジした日本の食文化のひとつと言えるでしょう」
Main.TextENG: ``In its homeland of India, curry is usually eaten with a type of bread called 'naan,' isn't it?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14430. Therefore, you could say that this cuisine we call curry rice, is something that we have adopted and modified.

Main.TextJPN: 「冒頭に先生が仰られた通り、インドと日本の文化の融合の結晶なのです」
Main.TextENG: Just as the teacher said at the beginning, it's a fusion of Indian and Japanese cuisine.``

Main.TextJPN: 「前原くんの言うことはわかります。@k@vS19/22/501400036.でも、それとおにぎりにどんな関係が…」
Main.TextENG: ``I know what you're trying to say, Maebara-kun.@k@vS19/22/501400036. But what does that have to do with onigiri...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「とても簡単なことなんですよ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14460.…カレーもおにぎりも、…お米をおいしく食べるための知恵なんですッ！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``It's actually very simple.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14460. ...Both curry and onigiri... are things made to let you enjoy eating rice!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 古代中国よりの米の伝来。
Main.TextENG: Rice was introduced to Japan from ancient China.

Main.TextJPN: …農耕種族たる祖先たちは田に水を引き、天気や病虫害と戦いながら育んできた米主食の文化…！！
Main.TextENG: ...Our agricultural forebears watered the fields, fighting the elements, disease, and pests to grow and raise our rice-centric culture...!!!

Main.TextJPN: そう日本人は様々な料理を編み出してきたが、それは所詮、米をおいしくたべるための方法の模索でしかない！！！@k　つまり…、
Main.TextENG: Yes, the Japanese people have formulated a plethora of dishes, but those were nothing more than attempts to find ways to enjoy eating rice!!!@k In other words...

Main.TextJPN: 「カレーもおにぎりも……同じ米食文化の…」
Main.TextENG: ``Curry and onigiri... are both the results of...``

Main.TextJPN: 「結晶なのですッ！！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Rice Culture!!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: ぱらぱらと、そして徐々に轟々と。@k俺を称える拍手が鳴り始める！！
Main.TextENG: It was scattered at first, but slowly grew into a steady roar...@k It was a thunderous applause that praised me!

Main.TextJPN: 「よ、世迷言もほどほどになさいませー！！！！@k@vS19/04/500400051.　認めませんわよ～！！@k@vS19/04/500400052.　先生はカレーの出来を採点してますのよ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Enough with the nonsense already!!!!@k@vS19/04/500400051. I won't accept this!!@k@vS19/04/500400052. The teachers are only judging curry, you know!``

Main.TextJPN: 「こんなのは採点外！@k@vS19/04/500400054.　零点が相応しいに決まってるでございますわー！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``This is out of the question!@k@vS19/04/500400054. It obviously deserves 0 points!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「せ、先生…。圭一くんは頑張ったんです。@k@vS19/02/500200047.認めてあげてください…」
Main.TextENG: ``M-Miss... Keiichi-kun did his best.@k@vS19/02/500200047. Could you please acknowledge that...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……カレーの授業のはずだったのに…。@k@vS19/22/501400038.どうしましょう」
Main.TextENG: ``...Today's class was supposed to be about curry...@k@vS19/22/501400038. What should we do?``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音が、ふっと鼻で笑ってから歩み出た。
Main.TextENG: Mion, stifling her laughter, stepped forward.

Main.TextJPN: 「かつてフランスからある高名なシェフが来日した時、ホテルの人たちが様々な材料をフランスから空輸したんだそうです。@k@vS19/03/500300065.でもそのシェフはそれらに見向きもしませんでした」
Main.TextENG: ``There's a story about how when a famous chef from France came to Japan, the people from the hotel he was staying at had a whole bunch of ingredients imported from France.@k@vS19/03/500300065. But the chef didn't even give them a second glance.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……どうしてなのですか。@k@vS19/05/500500031.本場の材料さんなのですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...I wonder why that was.@k@vS19/05/500500031. They were ingredients from his homeland.``

Main.TextJPN: 「シェフは地元の漁港へ行き、日本で取れた新鮮な幸を使って料理を作ったそうです」
Main.TextENG: ``The chef went to the local fishmarket, and made a dish from fresh fish caught in Japan.

Main.TextJPN: 「食文化は決められたルールに縛られるものじゃない。@k@vS19/03/500300068.…文化なんです。日本に来れば日本の文化と溶け合ってまた新しいものを形作る」
Main.TextENG: The culture of food isn't bound by predetermined rules.@k@vS19/03/500300068. ...It's culture. If you come to Japan, you meld with Japanese culture and make something new.

Main.TextJPN: 「……だからカレーもおにぎりも、同じ日本の文化なんです」
Main.TextENG: ...That's how curry and onigiri are the same.``

Main.TextJPN: み、魅音………。@k援護射撃…感謝。
Main.TextENG: Mi-Mion...@k She was providing fire support... I had to be grateful.

Main.TextJPN: 審査員たちもなんだかありがたそうな雑学知識に根拠なく感動している。
Main.TextENG: The judges were somehow moved by this complicated-yet-baseless trivia.

Main.TextJPN: 先生は一際厳しい目つきになり、腕を組みなおした。
Main.TextENG: A stern look washed over the teacher's face as she refolded her arms.

Main.TextJPN: 「…………前原くんは、カレーのお鍋をひっくり返してしまったそうですね？@k@vS19/22/501400040.　危ないから気をつけなさいと始めにあれだけ言ったのに」
Main.TextENG: ``...Maebara-kun, your pot of curry was flipped over, wasn't it?@k@vS19/22/501400040. Even though I said at the beginning to be careful.``

Main.TextJPN: 「す、すみません…」
Main.TextENG: ``I-I'm sorry...``

Main.TextJPN: 「ですが、……前原くんや園崎さんが言うように、食文化には垣根はありません。@k@vS19/22/501400042.人を心底感嘆させるものなら、その形式はなんら差別されるものではない」
Main.TextENG: ``But... as Maebara-kun and Sonozaki-san said, there are no boundaries in cuisine.@k@vS19/22/501400042. If it's something that can amaze people, then it's not something that should be discriminated against just because of the form.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……じゃあ？　じゃあ？」
Main.TextENG: ``...Then? Then?``

Main.TextJPN: 「お鍋をひっくり返したので減点２０。@k@vS19/22/501400044.…でも今日だけですよ。@k@vS19/22/501400045.挫けないでがんばったので特別に２０点プラス」
Main.TextENG: ``For spilling your pot, minus 20 points.@k@vS19/22/501400044. ...But, just for today...@k@vS19/22/501400045. For not giving up, and doing your best, plus 20 points.``

Main.TextJPN: 「百点をあげておきましょう」
Main.TextENG: ``I'll give you 100 points.``

Main.TextJPN: 「「ま、前原さん！！　やったぁあぁあぁあああッ！！！」」
Main.TextENG: ````Ma-Maebara-san!! We did iiiiiIIIIiiiiiiIIIiiit!!!````

Main.TextJPN: 後輩たちが飛びついてくる！！@k　百点だ！！@k　やったやったッ！！
Main.TextENG: My underclassmen leapt at me!!@k A perfect score!!@k We did it! We did it!!

Main.TextJPN: カレー鍋をひっくり返されご飯を奪われ…。@kでも返り咲いた！！
Main.TextENG: The curry was spilt and our rice was taken...@k But we made a comeback!!

Main.TextJPN: 結局、梨花ちゃんのカレーも満点だったので、レナ以外は全員満点ということになった。
Main.TextENG: In the end, Rika-chan's curry also received full marks, so everybody but Rena had a perfect score.

Main.TextJPN: ……部活番外編なので罰ゲームは特にない。@kレナは胸を撫で下ろす。
Main.TextENG: ...Since this contest was outside the scope of regular club activities, there wasn't any particular penalty game.@k Rena breathed a sigh of relief.

Main.TextJPN: 「さて、約束だぞ。沙都子に梨花ちゃん。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14520.君たちのカレーは没収する」
Main.TextENG: ``Now then, as promised. Satoko. Rika-chan.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14520. I'll be taking your curry.``

Main.TextJPN: 「そそ、それじゃ私たちのお昼がなくなっちゃいますわ～？　ぅぅ～～！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Bu-Bu-But that means we won't have any lunch~! Wahhh~~!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 沙都子は地団駄を踏んで悔しがるが、敗北の支払いは絶対だ。
Main.TextENG: Satoko stomped angrily at the ground in frustration, but the price of defeat was absolute.

Main.TextJPN: 「と言いたいところだが、情けだ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14540.半分は食って良し！！」
Main.TextENG: ``--Is what I wanted to say, but I'll show you some mercy.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14540. You can eat half!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭一、ありがとうなのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...Thank you, Keiichi.``

Main.TextJPN: 物陰からうかがう後輩二人組が感涙を滝のように流しながら、男同士にしか通じ得ないアイコンタクトを送ってくる。
Main.TextENG: My two protégés peered over from the sidelines, tears of joy streaming from their faces. We exchanged glances that would only be understood amongst men.

Main.TextJPN: ぅぅ…やりましたね前原さんッ！！
Main.TextENG: We-We did it, Maebara-san!!

Main.TextJPN: あぁ、お前らのお陰だぜッ！！
Main.TextENG: Aah, this is all thanks to you!!

Main.TextJPN: 互いに親指を立ててガッツポーズ！　ビシリッ！
Main.TextENG: We flashed each other a thumbs-up!

Main.TextJPN: 「さて…このカレーは後輩たちに渡して、っと。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14560.俺も腹が減ったよな。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14570.自分のおにぎりでも食うか。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14580.…………って、あれ？」
Main.TextENG: ``Now... I just have to give these to my pupils.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14560. I've gotten pretty hungry myself.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14570. I guess I'll have one of my onigiri.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI14580. ......Wai— huh?``

Main.TextJPN: 俺のおにぎりが…跡形もない。
Main.TextENG: There was no trace of my onigiri.

Main.TextJPN: 俺の分に取っておいたはずのもない。
Main.TextENG: The ones I had set aside for myself included.

Main.TextJPN: きょろきょろと探す俺の肩を校長がバシンと叩いた。
Main.TextENG: As I peered around searching for them, the principal clapped a hand on my shoulder.

Main.TextJPN: 「がっはっはっは！！@k@vS19/00/503200018.　さっきの前原くんの話を聞いていたら、噛み締める米の味が一際美味でのぅ！！@k@vS19/00/503200019.　がっはっはっはっは！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Gahahaha!!@k@vS19/00/503200018. When I was listening to that speech you gave, the rice I was chewing grew even more delicious!!@k@vS19/00/503200019. Gahahahaha!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「あの……ひょっとして…俺の分も食べちゃいました…？」
Main.TextENG: ``Ummm... could it be... that you also ate my share...?``

Main.TextJPN: 「がっはっはっはっはっはっは！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Gahahahahahaha!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 校長は大声で笑うだけで答えてくれない…。
Main.TextENG: The principal simply laughed without answering...

Main.TextJPN: マ、マジかよ………。
Main.TextENG: Se-Seriously...?

Main.TextJPN: 半目に涙を溜めながら、ぐ～とお腹を鳴らす俺を、先生が呼ぶ。
Main.TextENG: My eyes half-brimming with tears and my stomach rumbling, I was called over by the teacher.

Main.TextJPN: 「前原くん、さっきはああいう場だったので満点ということにしましたが……、わかっていますね？」
Main.TextENG: ``Maebara-kun, because of the circumstances, I had to give you a perfect score, but... You understand, right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「へ？　わかってって……何がっすか」
Main.TextENG: ``Huh? Understand... what?``

Main.TextJPN: 先生の瞳の色が変だ。
Main.TextENG: There was an odd glint in the teacher's eyes.

Main.TextJPN: ……なんていうのか…カレー色だ。
Main.TextENG: ...If I had to describe it... it was curry-colored.

Main.TextJPN: 煮込んだカレー鍋のように、瞳がぐるぐると渦を巻いている…。@kぞくりと悪寒。
Main.TextENG: Like a pot of stewing curry, her eyes whirled around in a spiral.@k A chill washed over me.

Main.TextJPN: 先生がガシっと俺の両肩を掴み、鼻がくっつくほどの間近に引き寄せた。
Main.TextENG: The teacher clutched me by the shoulders, and drew me in closer until our noses were almost touching.

Main.TextJPN: 「カレーはこの世で一番尊くて神聖な素晴らしい料理です。@k@vS19/22/501400049.それとおにぎりを同一扱いするなんて断固許せません」
Main.TextENG: ``Curry is this world's most respected and sacred of dishes.@k@vS19/22/501400049. I will absolutely not allow it to be put in the same category as onigiri.``

Main.TextJPN: 「いいですか？」
Main.TextENG: ``You hear me?``

Main.TextJPN: 「カレーは四大河川文明に匹敵する第五の文明として古代インドに生まれ、アショカ王の時代にカピラ城でシャカの生誕に万国食文化博覧会が絶賛してミシュランぐるぐるエッフェル塔すらもカレー漬けをぐつぐつ煮込んでターメリックが寝ても覚めてもカレーカレーカレーカレー……」
Main.TextENG: ``CurryWasCreatedInAncientIndiaOneOfTheFourGreatRiverValleyCivilizationsAndWasRavedAboutDuringTheReignOfKingAshokaInKapilavastuForTheBirthOfTheShakyaAtTheInternationalFoodExpoMichelinTwirlyTwirlyEvenTheEiffelTowerWasPickledInSimmeringCurryTurmericWhetherYouAreAsleepOrAwakeCurryCurryCurryCurry...``

Main.TextJPN: 「…ちょっと圭一さん！@k@vS19/04/500400057.　何をふらふらしてますのー！！@k@vS19/04/500400058.　後片付けもお料理の一部ですのよー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Hey, Keiichi-san!@k@vS19/04/500400057. What are you stumbling around for!!@k@vS19/04/500400058. Cleaning up is a part of cooking too!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一くん、目がカレーだよ？@k@vS19/02/500200049.　どうしたのかな？　かな？」
Main.TextENG: ``Keiichi-kun, your eyes are all curried!@vS19/02/500200049. Why is that? Why?``

Main.TextJPN: カレーカレーカレー。@kくっくっくっく…♪
Main.TextENG: Curry curry curry.@k Hehehehe...♪

Main.TextJPN: 「あちゃー…やられたか。@k@vS19/03/500300071.大丈夫、一昼夜で元に戻るよ。@k@vS19/03/500300072.多分」
Main.TextENG: ``Yikes... she got him, huh.@vS19/03/500300071. It's okay, he'll be back to normal by tomorrow.@vS19/03/500300072. Probably.``

Main.TextJPN: 空腹感で我に返るまでにそう時間はかからなかった…。
Main.TextENG: It wasn't that long before hunger brought me back to my senses.
